Translations.Text: When the sky is split
and when the stars are scattered
and when the seas are flooded (and overflow)
and when the graves are turned upside down
a person knows what he sent ahead and put off
Human being, what deceived you about your noble Master
The One who created you, then He shaped you and balanced you
And He put you together in whatever form He wanted
No way, but you deny the Judgment
while indeed there are guardians over you
nobles writing down
who know whatever you do
Indeed the good ones are in delight
and indeed the immoral ones are in hellfire
They enter (and burn in) there on the judgment day
and they are not absent from it (beyond its reach)
And do you know what the judgment day is
And again, do you know what the judgment day is
A day when a person does not have the least bit of power for another one, and on that day the command (and judgment) belongs to God
Woe to those who give less than is due (the cheaters)
those who when they take a measure (or an amount) from people, they take it in full
and when they give an amount to them or they weigh for them, they give less
Do they not think that indeed they will be raised
for a great day
A day when people stand before the Master of Human kind
